output:
**General Query Response:**

I understand you're asking: "Tax planning tips"

I'm currently running with enhanced rule-based responses. While I can provide basic guidance on common tax and business queries, for complex questions I recommend consulting a qualified professional.

**Helpful Resources:**
• GST Portal: https://www.gst.gov.in/
• Income Tax Portal: https://www.incometax.gov.in/
• MCA Portal: https://www.mca.gov.in/

**InvoNest Features:**
• Professional invoice templates
• GST-compliant formats
• Payment tracking
• Tax calculations

Feel free to ask more specific questions - I'll do my best to help!
